assignments.description: Since the Caller Relation field is using an Inactive picklist value, this is assigning the Caller Relation to 'Other' and using the inactive picklist value in the Relation Type Other field.
assignments.name: Assign_Invalid_Picklist_to_Relation_Type_Other_Field
assignments.label: Assign Invalid Picklist to Relation Type Other Field

decisions.name: Are_there_available_record_types_for_this_users_VISN
decisions.label: Are there available record types for this users VISN?

decisions.description: Checking to see if the Caller Relation field contains an inactive picklist value.
decisions.name: Does_the_Caller_Relation_Field_Include_an_Inactive_Picklist_Value
decisions.label: Does the Caller Relation Field Include an Inactive Picklist Value

decisions.description: If case is clinical triage, initiate E911 LWC
decisions.name: Is_Clinical_Triage
decisions.label: Is Clinical Triage?

decisions.description: Checks the VAHC_E911_Settings to see if e911_Enabled__c is true or not to either allow for e911 screen component to display or bypass instead
decisions.name: Is_e911_Enabled
decisions.label: Is e911 Enabled

decisions.name: New_Case_or_Create_Related_Case
decisions.label: New Case or Create Related Case?

Flow.description: Allows users to create a related case Redirecting to related case - edit mode -------- Removed edit mode from this version since it still needs to be approved by IVC -------- Added check for invalid picklist values on the Caller Relation field -------- 04/16/24 : Adding E911 Confirm Location LWC if record type is clinical triage

formulas.description: Is the user a Medical Provider
formulas.name: varIsMP

Flow.label: VCC Create Related Case

fields.name: retrievedErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: NoAvailableRecordTypesMessage
fields.fieldText: There are no available case types to choose from. If you believe this is an error, contact the help desk.

fields.name: NoQueuesAvailableMessage
fields.fieldText: There are no case queues available for your VISN. If you believe this is an error, contact the help desk.
